## Loading the data

```{r}
data <- read.table(unz("activity.zip", "activity.csv"), header=T, sep=",")
```

## Replacing any NA's in the *steps* column assuming they are intended to be considered as zeroes
```{r}
data$steps <- ifelse(is.na(data$steps), 0, data$steps)
```

## Interpreting the columns according the data type they were intended for,respectively Numeric, ***date*** and Numeric
```{r}
data$steps <- as.numeric(data$steps)
data$interval <- as.numeric(data$interval)
```
